name: Perspective Platformer PROTOTYPE
description:
A prototype for a game i wanna make titled: perspective platformer 

the game would be a 3D platformer that would ultilize your perspective going from a 3D to 2D to orphographic, and other perspectives

this is a VERY SHORT 1 level demo showing the 3D and 2D perspective 

if you wanna help make this a full game add me on discord (you wont get paid)
